name: Hentai Parody: Tentacle Slayer
description:
In this visual novel, you get to learn a tragic love story told by the "classic hentai villain". What if, from the beginning of time, the mission of tentacle monsters was to bring beauty to our world by reciting poetry? All this so that a worthy earthly woman could enjoy the art of haiku. After all, the true valor of the samurai from the depths is measured by the greatness of his poems and devotion to his beloved. Someone who's ready to die for him and become a legend!



- Story told by a typical hentai villain
- Naked babes dying for tight and strong tentacles
- Japanese voice acting
- Love story full of laughter and tears
- More than a hundred QTE tests
- Two endings
- Tentacles!!!
